ai-atk-abh03a50:1_0: The gods of the Three and Thirty,
ai-atk-abh03a50:2_0: I’ve taught this Dhamma, the master Yamaka,
ai-atk-abh03a50:3_0: For the meaning of the teaching is deep,
ai-atk-abh03a50:4_0: The seventh subsiding is the seventh section.
ai-atk-abh03a50:5_0: When name and form are doesn’t cease,
ai-atk-abh03a50:6_0: He taught the color of unintelligent, the color of protection.
ai-atk-abh03a50:7_0: But now my appearance and health,
ai-atk-abh03a50:8_0: That’s why I will listen to you.
